trans_title: 世界上最美丽的地方:加州红树林海岸
introduction: Long hours want to admire the giant trees, thousands of years extending to the light. The soft bark sekvoy under the influence of the sun changes its hues from bright - red to chocolate - brown. Enjoy serene calm of evergreen forests, thickets which hardly break silvery sunlight. If you go down the stream clear streams, you amaze crystal purity of the water column through which so clearly visible foundation of huge stones, lying motionless on the bottom.
chinese_title: 世界上最美丽的地方:加州红树林海岸
